sentences.en: A transparent cover is provided to protect the disc against accidental marking or smudging.
sentences.cn: 圆盘外有透明的防护罩,以免偶然在圆盘上弄上污点或线迹.

sentences.en: Draw up a scale floor plan on squared paper, marking in the door opening and windows.
sentences.cn: 在方格纸上画出成比例的楼层平面图，标出门和窗的位置。

sentences.en: He accused his teacher of unfair marking.
sentences.cn: 他指责教师打分不公平.

sentences.en: He was marking essays in his small study.
sentences.cn: 他正在他那间小书房里批阅文章。

sentences.en: He's really just marking time until he's old enough to leave.
sentences.cn: 他其实只是在消磨时光，等年龄一到就退休。

sentences.en: Leather overshoes were put on the horses' hooves to stop them marking the turf.
sentences.cn: 马蹄上套了皮套子，以免弄脏赛马场。

sentences.en: Marking examination papers is a real grind.
sentences.cn: 批改试卷的确是个苦事.

sentences.en: Marking the exam papers was quite a slog.
sentences.cn: 评阅试卷是很辛苦的工作.

sentences.en: Simply marking an answer wrong will not help the pupil to get future examples correct.
sentences.cn: 仅仅在答案上打叉号不会有助于学生做对日后的题目。

sentences.en: strange markings on the walls of the cave
The cornet is marking the time.
The headmaster is marking the papers.
The marking on the road is unclear.
The marking on the wall was childish and unsightly.
sentences.cn: 墙上的记号幼稚而难看.

sentences.en: The paperweight had fallen onto the desk, badly marking the surface.
sentences.cn: 镇纸掉到了桌上, 在桌面砸出了深深的印痕.

sentences.en: They are accusing the teacher of political bias in his marking.
sentences.cn: 他们在指控那名教师打分数有政治偏见.

sentences.en: They had stopped Ecuador from building up attacks with good marking.
sentences.cn: 他们运用出色的盯人技术使厄瓜多尔队无法组织起进攻。

words.tran_cn: 明显地；显著地；引人注目地
记分员；书签；标识物；作记号的人
表示（mark的过去分词）；作记号；打分数
标志；打分；做记号；[生物]斑纹
注意；作记号于；给…打分数（mark的ing形式）

phrases.tran_cn: 标印装置；压纹装置；记录装置
n. 打标机，标印机器；印字机；打号机
道路标记，路标；路面标示

trans.tran_cn: 标记，记号，（支票的）认付，斑纹，批改，打分
trans.tran_en: things painted or written on something, especially something such as an aircraft, road, vehicle etc

trans.tran_cn: 注意；作记号于；给…打分数（mark的ing形式）
